title: [Once and Floral]
description: Glowing orbs hang from each tent pole, casting a warm light throughout the area, with one particularly bright orb illuminating a calligraphed sign at the center of the shop.  Carefully arranged racks and stands house a lovely array of color-coordinated blooms and blossoms for sale.  A slender crystalline vase sits upon a marble pedestal in the rear of the tent.
